00007 import javax.swing.*;

00009 import java.awt.*;
00010 import java.awt.event.*;
00011 import java.util.HashMap;
00012 
00013 import javax.swing.text.*;
00014 import javax.swing.event.*;
00015 import javax.swing.undo.*;
00016 
00024 //This listens for and reports caret movements.
00025 public class CaretListenerLabel
00026         implements CaretListener {
00027 
00028     public CaretListenerLabel(JLabel jLabel, JTextPane jTextPane) {
00029     //    super(label);
00030         jLabelLocal = jLabel;
00031         jTextPaneLocal = jTextPane;
00032     }
00033 
00034     //Might not be invoked from the event dispatch thread.
00035     public void caretUpdate(CaretEvent e) {
00036         generateCaretString(e.getDot(), e.getMark());
00037    //     generateSelectionInfoString(e.getDot(), e.getMark());
00038         jLabelLocal.setText(getText());
00039     }
00040 
00041     private void generateCaretString(int dot, int mark) {
00042         if (dot == mark) {  // no selection
00043             try {
00044                 Rectangle caretCoords = jTextPaneLocal.modelToView(dot);
00045                 //Convert it to view coordinates.
00046           //      setText(dot + " [" + caretCoords.x + ", " + caretCoords.y + "]" + newline);
00047                 // Is this because the caret position labeller is broken?
00048                 setText("broken");
00049             } catch (BadLocationException ble) {
00050                 setText("caret: text position: " + dot + newline);
00051             }
00052         } else if (dot < mark) {
00053             setText(dot + " to " + mark + newline);
00054         } else {
00055             setText(mark + " to " + dot + newline);
00056         }
00057     }
00058     
00059     //This method can be invoked from any thread.  It 
00060     //invokes the setText and modelToView methods, which 
00061     //must run on the event dispatch thread. We use
00062     //invokeLater to schedule the code for execution
00063     //on the event dispatch thread.
00064     protected void generateSelectionInfoString(final int dot,
00065             final int mark) {
00066         SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
00067 
00068             public void run() {
00069                 if (dot == mark) {  // no selection
00070                     try {
00071                         Rectangle caretCoords = jTextPaneLocal.modelToView(dot);
00072                         //Convert it to view coordinates.
00073                         setText(dot + " [" + caretCoords.x + ", " + caretCoords.y + "]" + newline);
00074                     } catch (BadLocationException ble) {
00075                         setText("caret: text position: " + dot + newline);
00076                     }
00077                 } else if (dot < mark) {
00078                     setText(dot + " to " + mark + newline);
00079                 } else {
00080                     setText(mark + " to " + dot + newline);
00081                 }
00082             }
00083             });
00084     
00085     }
00086     public void setText(String text) {
00087         caretString = text;
00088     }
00089     
00090     public String getText() {
00091         return caretString;
00092     }
00093     
00094     private String caretString = "none";
00095     private javax.swing.JTextPane jTextPaneLocal;
00096     private javax.swing.JLabel jLabelLocal;
00097     private String newline = "\n";
00098     }
